subject: Pictures of Rosemary with boxes from last night
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hey... make sure you guys check out the picture page showing pics of 
Rosemary Ellen Guiley with Frank's Box, the hacked Radio Shack 12-
469, and the Mini Box while she was in the Coast to Coast AM studio 
last night.  The link to those pictures is below:
http://www.coasttocoastam.com/gen/page2333.html?theme=light

- Mike



Radio Shack Hack stuff:
12-469 & 12-470 "Ghost Box" type functionality modifications (For
sweeping band raw audio output)

A Video on how to modify the RS 12-469 radio:
http://www.ufogeek.com/12-469mod.wmv

A Video on how to modify the RS 12-470 radio:
http://www.ufogeek.com/12-470mod.wmv

A Video of a practical use of the modified 12-469:
Part 1: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HH_9MdJdRzo
Part 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=unVPgqoBhx8

A more detailed, step-by-step video of practical use of the hacked 12-
469:
http://www.ufogeek.com/spiricomp/spiricomp_practical.wmv
